Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
The Python Computer Graphics Kit is an Open Source software package
      containing a collection of Python modules and utilities that can be used in the
      domain of computer graphics, visual effects, animation and similar areas.
info.name: cgkit
info.html_description:
The Python Computer Graphics Kit is an Open Source software package
containing a collection of Python modules and utilities that can be used in the domain of computer graphics, visual effects, animation and similar areas.
